building_cost.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.

frame.componentleveltooltip: Building health||This building is damaged. It can either be fully repaired for a cost, or slowly repair itself over time.

tech.componentleveltooltip: Required technology not yet researched.||Left-click to display the technology chain for this item.

turns_center.componentleveltooltip: Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.

cyclical.name: cyclical
cyclical.tooltip: Turns to cycle to this level

cost_list.componentleveltooltip: Cost||This amount will be deducted from your {{tr:icon_treasury}}{{tr:treasury}} in order to construct this building.

tier_label.componentleveltooltip: Required settlement level for this building to automatically construct

callback_with_context.context_function_id: slot = StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot") | slot.IsBuildingNew || slot.IsUpgrading || slot.IsRepairing => "UI_CAM_HUD_Construction_Cancel" | slot.IsDismantling => "UI_CLICK_Cancel_Decline" | slot.CanUpgrade && self.ParentContext.Id != "slot_entry" && !slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Building_Upgrade" | slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Construction_Start"

slot = StoredContextFromParent("CcoCampaignBuildingSlot") | slot.IsBuildingNew || slot.IsUpgrading || slot.IsRepairing => "UI_CAM_HUD_Construction_Cancel" | slot.IsDismantling => "UI_CLICK_Cancel_Decline" | slot.CanUpgrade || slot.CanConvert && self.ParentContext.Id != "slot_entry" && !slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => "UI_CLICK_Building_Upgrade" | slot.IsEmpty && self.CurrentState == "hover" => { slot.CharacterContext.MilitaryForceContext.ForceType == "MALAKAI_BOUND_HORDE" | "UI_CAM_DWF_SpiritOfGrugni" | "UI_CLICK_Construction_Start" }

lifecycle_turns.componentleveltooltip: Construction turns left||You are currently building this item.
